div.p:
The xvj dai of aprile yer' et cetera lxxvij / before Johne Wormot ane of the balyes sit
tand in iugement / William moyses producit for witnes be Johne malisson / sworn
deponit / that he gef and deliuerit til Alexander trail and Johne of ruthirfurd for the
rude of rynche wyne that he had fra the saidis Alexander and Johne of ruthirfurd
in tapping fifty pundis scottis

the xviij dai of aprile forsaid / before the aldirman balyes and consale . It was
grantit and consentit be Dauid crukschank and Arthur of forbes his forspekar
in his name that on tusda cum viij dais gif thomas symson be present or ony vthir
dai thareftir as salbe sene spedful in the tym / that he the said Dauid sal vndir
ly and fulfil the knaulege of vnsuspect persons xv or xvij belanging the
debatis of al landis and annuel rentis that Wilyam fichet was vmquhile pos
sessour of and that the son of quhilum Johne edwardson wes in on the sam wise
And this he is bundin todo be the fath of his body / And falyeand that thomas
simson be nocht present at tym and dai forsaidis / the erast tym that Arthur of forbes
cumis til aberdene til haf a decision as forsaid is withoute preiudice of party
And the said Dauid has constitute the forsaid Arthur his procuratour in his absens
vnto the finale determinacion of the saidis debatis promittand tohald ferm and stable

the sam dai Dauid colison and Dauid Kintor burgez of abirdene becom souerte for Wilyam
Kintor til John Wormot / for a gold ring with a stane of pillar' / that thai sal deliuer
him at the hame cuming of he said Wilyam / the same ring / and falyeand of his
cuming thai ar dettouris to pay the said ring or the price tharof gif it be away
And the said Wilyam has oblist him his landis and gudis tokepe thaim scathles et cetera

The said dai before Dauid menyes ane of the balyes / Edward top has constitute Dauid
colison his procuratour actour and factour in al and sindri causis and querelis pertening or may pertain
til him / and specialy concerning the biging of a gavyl betuix the landis of the said Ed
ward and thomas litstar in the galowgate / And the said edward has promittit tohald
ferme and stabil quhatsumeuir thing his said procuratour laghfully sal do or lede
tobe done anent the said biging and al vthiris actionis belanging til him in his name
before thir witnes' Dauid howison Wilyam quelp Donald litstar burgessis of Aberdene
and frer' thomas paxton' with vthiris sindrie

The xxvj dai of aprile yer' of god M iiijc lxxvij yeris Comperit Androw fresal the
fadir of vmquhile Alexander fresal burges of Aberdene in the tolbuthe of that ilk
and grantit him til haue ressauit fra Androw scherar' aldirman of Aberdene and
ser alexander voket executouris til vmquhile the said Alexander fresal / thir gudis vndir
writin In the first a dusan of eistland buyrdis Item fyve bollis of salt and
thre firlotis / ane tvme hamburgh barel / and a fat made of a malvasy bote
Item twelf mvd keling and threttene mvd codlingis fourtene inglis coppis
and a waiscour fat / thre peckis of lynget and thre pekkis of hemp sede /
four stupis / ane vly barel / a poke / threttene knapold / And to the lard
of pitslego on Androw fresalis behalf the petis that war prisit fouretene
schillingis / And to androw fresalis wif ane inglis cop / a par' of schetis / ane
nop bed / a bowtsar / twa gownys / thre hand axis / a brogit scaf / a
litil ankyr / a gyrdil / a bakbrede / a brewyne fat / a hemmyr stand / a
bukket and a gybbate that it hang by / foure tynnyn spunys / his best bate
Item a hat / a bonet / a doublat / a par' of hois' twa par' of schetis / a
Jak / ten s' of siluer and sextene s' and aucht d' gevin to the Abbot of Arbroth
for the annuel of the hous' that the said androw occupyit and inhabite And the
forsaid Androw fresal has oblist him be the faith of his body / that he sal nevyr
cum in contrar' of the said grant of his ressate of the fornemit gudis and deliuerens
made tharof in his name as forsaid is bot quitclemis the saidis executouris tharof
now and for evyr before thir witnez gilbert of chavmer Wilyam hay Johne coli
son William blindsel eldar patrik stiklaw and vthiris sindrie

Curia legalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxviijo
die aprilis anno Domini mo iiijco lxxvijo / quo die secte vocate et curia affirmata
absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Agnes necolson relicta quondam Willelmi lorymar coram preposito et ballivis
constituit dominum matheum necolson capellanum fratrem ipsius agnetis suum procuratorem legittimum
in omnibus causis placitis et querelis ipsam tangens seu tangere valens ad
agendum et defendendum pro se prout Jura volunt Et promisit de Rato et cetera

Item eodem die Alexander trail secundo die vocatus ad sectam Johannis malisson responsurus
plegio super eundem porrecto ut patet in processu primi diei Non comparuit vnde
precipitur sergeando capere districtum et cetera et premunire ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem
tanquam tercium diem placiti

Curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem die quinta
mensis maij anno Domini supra dicto

Quo die patricius androson et Johannes fichat nauta accusati per prepositum pro iniusta
absencia eorum ab aliis burgi equitatibus in communi actione ad perambulacionem fiendum inter
communitatem huius ville et Andream fresal de stanywod iuxta tenorem compromissi desuper facti /
posuerunt se in voluntate prepositi de dicta calumpnia Igitur ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur in amerciamento
curie et emend' prout Jura volunt Et dictus patricius inuenit Willelmum hay plegium / et Johannes
fichet dedit andream branch plegium pro eo ad comparendum coram preposito et consilio die sabbati proximo subeund' ordinacionj eorundem

Eodem die thomas narn carnifex conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro pertur
bacione Ricardi hil et Ranaldi talyour in verbo et emend' dampnum ut Jura
volunt vnde adiungitur ei ad deliberandum dimidium petre cere ad missam sancti sanguinis
pro suis verbis iniuriosis illatis dictis personis confratribus gilde Et si de cetero inueniatur
quod perturbat aliquem confratrem gilde uel alias personas honestas huius burgi verbo aut facto
priuabitur a libertate burgi quam habet / et sic deliberatum fuit per assisam et prepositum nomine eiusdem assise

Willelmus quelp inuenit gilbertum morison plegium pro eo ad intrandum coram preposito et consilio
die sabbati proximo venturo responsurus pro absencia sua a preposito et aliis de communitate equitatibus ad
perambulacionem et subeundum eorum ordinacioni et decreto et cetera

Octauo die mensis maij anno Domini et cetera lxxvijo Comparente Willelmo cantlee burgense de Aberdene
coram preposito et diuersis consilij dicti burgi / quasdam litteras regias legitimacionis et licencie dicto
Willelmo magno sigillo regio sigillatas produxit et perlegi fecit / quibus perlectis tus
Willelmus vigore litterarum predictarum fecit constituit et creauit Johannem cantlee filium
fratris sui senioris suum verum heredem suis propriis heredibus de corpore suo deficientibus
omnium terrarum suarum annuorum reddituum bonorumque mobilium et immobilium habitorum
et habendorum assignando in manibus dicti prepositi vnum librum computi sui nomine dicti Johannis
cantlee tunc absentis et heredum suorum /. libero tenemento sibi Willelmo et mario
te sponse sue pro tempore vite eorum remanen' secundum formam et tenorem cuiusdam instrumenti sub sigillo
communi dicti burgi desuper confecti in quo res sue mobiles et immobiles dicto Willelmo reseruantur ad sue
libitum volunt disponend' et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xijo de mensis
maij predicti / quo die secta vocata et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo secte

Eodem die Nicolaus mason posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de amerciamento curie pro
iniusta deposicione et deiectione certi edificij seu muri patricij stiklau / et eius
dabit dampnum prout iura volunt

Item eodem die Dauid spens purgauit se ex deliberacione assise de iniusta detencione
xvj s' viij d' clamat' per gilbertum morisone / et dictus gilbertus in amerciamento pro
iniusta prosecucione eiusdem

Item eodem die Alexander trail tercio die vocatus ad sectam Johannis malissone responsurus
plegio super eundem per dictum Johannem extenso ut patet in rotulamento primi diei / non comparuit
Igitur precipitur sergeando capere districtum et cetera et summonend' ipsum alexandrum ad proximam curiam
legalem tanquam quartam diem huius processus
Johannes gregorij conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione curie et cetera

The xvj dai of maij yer' et cetera lxxvij / It is appointit and accordit betuix Androw murra
eldar and Johne stewart on theta part / and thomas of schethyn on the tothir part
anent the buyrdis that the said thomas was adiugit and ordanit to pay to the saidis
androw and Johne that is tosay / fourty burdis til androw murref and twenty til
Johne stewart / that the said thomas sal pay and content now in hand xx buyrdis
or the price that he sald thaim for as he wil depone be his aith tharof xiiij
burdis to the said androw or the ful price tharfor as said is / and vj burdis or the price
that he tuke tharfor til Johne stewart / And the said thomas sal content and assithe
the fourty burdis remanand til the saidis androw and Johne alsfer as pertenis
til ilkane of thaim at the feist of Sanct michel next tocum / and falyeand
of the burdis / the said thomas sal pay the ful price that he tuke for
the burdis that he sald now last et cetera

the same dai Dauid symson Alexander howison Robert blindsel androw murra eldar and adam
of crafurd arbitrouris chosin betuix thomas of chamer on theta part / and murtho glenmalin
on the tothir part / anent the debate and clame of a pety quartar of salt / brocht in peter brandis schip
of the quhilk the said murtho was merchand to the said thom / has fundit decretit and deliue
rit / that murtho glenmalvine / sal free the said thomas of chamer of al clame of the said salt

The xix dai of maij yer' et cetera lxxvij / the aldirman and the consale statute and ordanit
al the couparis personaly comperand before thaim that thai mak na salmound
barellis bot of sufficiant moysoune and mesure that be sure and thight
and that thai and ilkane of thaim put thare mark on the barellis that thai
mak / And quha that dois in contrar' heirof / the barellis salbe eschete / and
thare personis punyst / and ilkane of thaim sal pay ane vnlau of viij s' vnforgevin

Eodem die Willelmus blindsel senior deuenit plegius legalis pro Simone de gardyn quod
Willelmus rettre ac sui seruientes et tenentes inhabitantes terras suas erunt indemp
nes de ipso Simone et parte sua aliter quam iura volunt Et similiter Dauid colisone
plegius pro dicto Willelmo ut supra

Item the sam dai It was fundin and deliuerit be ane assise that Sym of gardyn has
na rycht to the tak and assedacione of William rettris land that he now inhabitis
forthir than Witsundai / And that the said land suld be red to Wilyam moyses
and his wif at the said feist of Witsundai next tocum / as tenentis of the same

In the balye court haldin the xxij dai of maij It was fundin and deliuerit be
ane assise that thare was na condicione made betuix Alexander of mar and
Yane mewson skippar of the fraght of a pak of wad of the said alexandris
put in his schip bot that he bad the skippar tak it in / nocht nemmand na certan
fraght / for the quhilk thai haf decretit him topay to the said skippar a pipe fracht
for the said wad / like as vse and wount was tobe gevin til vthiris skipparis / And
that the said alexandris kyst suld pay na fraght as for a merchandis kyst / becaus'
thare wes na merchandis' in it et cetera

Curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xxiijo die maij anno Domini Mo
iiijco lxxvijo

Quo die Andreas lammyntoune accusatus de perturbacione et deforciacione philippi de Dun
brek sergeandi suum officium ministrantis / posuit se in voluntate prepositi et ballivorum de dicta
calumpnia et adiudicatur in amerciamento et emendabit prout Jura volunt

The same dai anent twa bollis of salt clamit be thom chapman fra Johne
chapman his brothir / at the desire of the said Johne / he deponit be his aith that
the said ij bollis of salt war his awne propir and that the said Johne his brothir
bocht thaim at him for vj s' ilke bol / quhilkis he ressauit fra thare fadir quhilum
androw chapman oute of his buthe / And the balyeis has ordanit the said Johne to
content and pay the said thomas of the saidis / twa bollis of salt within laghful tyme

In curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxviijo die mensis maij predicti
thomas benyng litstar conuictus per assisam de iniusta perturbacione dominj Alexandri club capellani
in verbo adiudicatur in amerciamento / et emendabit prout Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes litstar in vico viridi deuenit plegius legalis pro Willelmo quelp de indemp
nitate henrici voket aliter quam Jura volunt / et ad intrandum eundem Willelmum coram preposito
ballivis et consulibus die veneris proximo venturo responsurus et iuri periturus pro perturbacione dicti henrici

Joneta vxor Dauid paterson conuicta per assisam adiudicatur in tribus amerciamentis in vno videlicet pro
perturbacione Ricardi litstar et in aliis ijbus pro perturbio Johannis et sponse eiusdem et cetera

Vicesimo septimo die mensis maij Anno et cetera lxxvijo quo die Dauid blabir' burgensis burgi de abirdene ex sua
certa sciencia matura deliberacione prehabita de consensu prepositi et quorundam consilij dicti burgi dedit et assignauit
realiter ricardo blabir filio suo secundario tunc presenti et acceptanti totam et integram s illam suam piscariam dimedij
rethis de ly mydscleyngyl super aqua de Dee quam habet in assidacione de preposito et communitati dicti burgi pro
omnibus terminis suis futuris secundum tenorem assidacionis eiusdem burgj Quam quidem piscoriam prefatus Dauid
constituit ordinauit et assignauit Johannem symsone burgensem dicti burgi ad piscandum et laborandum
eandem piscoriam annuatim adcoi ad communicandum et proficuum dicti ricardi filij suj secundarij et a filie sue
durantibus terminis sue assidacionis dicto Johanne symsone soluente annuatim firmam dicte piscarie quantum
pertinet ad eandem et decem libras vsualis monete scocie dictis prolibus ad eorum comodum per ipsum Johannem
disponendum et pro marito dicte filie Dauidis antedicte habendo Insuper dictus Dauid constituit ordinauit
atque legauit / prefatum Johannem symsone tutorem et gubernatorem ac curatum prefatorum Ricardi et dicte filie
sue ad regendum et gubernandum dictas proles et ad disponendum et distribuendum dictam summam
de dicta piscaria annuatim peruenientem ad vtilitatem et comodum dictarum prolium prout ipse voluuerit
respondere coram summo Judice Testibus Andrea scherar preposito Thoma de camera vno
balliuorum et Wilhelmo blinseile e Waltero redpetht Dauid blabir filio et Roberto leis
notario publico cum diuersis alijs
Curia ballivorum tenta xijo die mensis Junij Anno et cetera lxxvijo

quo die Thomas symsone burgensis
dicti burgi presentauit vnam litteram regiam penes vnam terram seu tenementum cum croftis et annis d redditibus
pertinentibus Jonete sponse eiusdem thome que habita fuit porrecta preposito et balliuusballiuis ad conseruandum
et defendendum dictam Jonetam cum suo sponso in dicta terra s cum suis pertinenciis indempnis et in pacifica
possessione b eiusdem tenimenti cum croftis et cetera prout Jura burgi volunt et requirunt

p.del:
The samyn day it is apontit and accordit and deliuerit be ane assice that alexander trail and
his factouris sal fysche y

div.p:
The sammyn day alexander rede ane of the bailyeis of Abirdene the quhilk was summonyt
be our' souerane lordis lettres be Dauid mathousone the xij day of this moneth to comper'
In Edinburght certane day assignit till hyme for certane caus' proferit hym befor the aldirman
and bailyes sittand' in Jugement sindri and diuers' of the comond' consale beand' present till
ondirly a knavlage of ane office of one suspectit personis of al causis and clamis the
quhilk the said' Davy hes to say till hym And the said assys' to dasside gif the said
David hes ony rycht to Wil maythousone sone till vmquhile Jhone mathousone
his brothir And heratour the forsade alexander rede proferit hyme till vndirly the acte
and decret maid in the tolbutht befor myn lord of abirdene and aldirman bailyes
of and consal most part of the consal beand' present yne that tym

Decimo tercio die mensis Junij Anno Domini et cetera lxxvijo Jhoannes mar receptus fuit
in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde confes prestito solito Juramento et cetera

Eodem die Dauid ego receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum prestito solito Juramento
et soluet preposito x s'

The xiiij day of Junij the yer et cetera lxxvij yeris Anent the clame of Jhone of
tulidef clamyt of Duncan sanquhar of murcroft that is for to say for claitht
xxv s' and ix d' for costis for the quhilk J the said Duncan sanquhar be come
borcht to pay the said some to the forsaid' Jhone of tulidefe the said Duncan
sanquhar is oblist befor the aldirman and certane of cunsale in the tolbutht
of Abirdene that gif he prefis nocht the said some payt be thomas vrquhart for
the quhilk he come borcht and that to be prefit on monunday eftir mydsomir day
nyxt tocum callit sant Jonis day the baptyst in the tolbutht of Abirdene befor
aldirman and bailyeis and failyand of his pref that day he sal content and assytht
to Jhone of tulydef but langar delay or deseruing als mekill as is vnpayt
till hym of the forsaid some of xxv s' and ix d' the quhilk dai assignit the lard
of murcroft as befor said is he was callit oftymis and nocht comperit Quharfor
he vart vardis that is fundyn be the court that he is dettour to Johne of tulidef for vij s'
wed' vnpayt of the forsaid sovme
Curia ballivorum tenta xvijo die mensis Junij anno quo supra lxxvijo

quo die Robertus
culpar' quittus per assisam de clameo s vj solidorum clamatorum per alexandrum chavmer

Eodem die casu causa et actio' mota per dominum robertum leis capellanum altaris beati sebas
tiani contra et uersus agnetam relictam quondam Johannis stephani et Johannem filium eiusdem agnetis
penes annuum redditum sex solidorum et octo denariorum de terra quondam andree spromt' Jacente in vico
inferiori ecclesia pertinente dicto domino Roberto racione sue infeodocionis continuatur de consensu parcium
vsque ad diem lune vltimum diem junij mensis instantis ad producendum euidencias et cartas pro defencione
dicte anni redidis annui redditi
as absque preiudicio dicti domini Roberti pro q ad dictum annuum reditum racione
sue fundacionis preme

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio coram Dauid menyes vno ballivorum huius burgi xxiijo
die Junij anno Domini mo iiijco lxxvijo

Quo die Duncanus sanquhar de murcroft primo die vocatus ad comparendum responsurus
plegio per Willelmum blindsele iuniorem in manibus philippi de Dunbrek sergeandi super ipsum
extenso pro iniusta detencione xviij librarum vsualis monete ad bonum compotum a
dicto Willelmo Non comparuit / Ideo precipitur seriando capere districtum de terra dicti
Duncani ad valorem amerciamenti curie et cetera et quod premuniat ipsum Duncanum ad proximam curiam
legalem responsurus ut supra tanquam secundum diem huius processus et cetera

The last dai of Junij / the yer of god M iiijC lxxvij yeris Sir Robert leis chapellane
of sant sebestianis alter in the paries kirk of Abirdene presand and profferit be for
aldirman and bailyeis sittand in Jugement till Agnes modir to Johone stevinson
hir sone possessor of ane land liand' in the nedir kirkgait for the
Redemyne of xl d' of annuel aucht till hyme as he alegis xxiij s'
ffor the quhilk sovme' the said annuel of xl d' liys in plege as the said
ser robert capellane' of the said alter alegis And protestyt that the said xl
d' of annuel haldyn and vnpayt till hym turym hym till na preiudice in
tyme tocum

The semmyn day thir personis vndirwrytin chosine till ane assice the gret aitht
sworne till disside and declar the arschip b clamit be Dame Dauid
mar on malcome mowat and his wif that ha is to say Dauid
symsone Gilbert morisone James clark James craik Wil mor Wat
of auchneif adam of crafurde Edmund lousone' Alexander hoysone
quhilk personis has' fundyn Daui mar sal haf thir gudis vndirwrytin
on his brothir behauf Johne of mar ffrest agovne' a chandeler
a cuche bede gif he had ane a siluer slef in the semmyn ply as it
wes the our that he salit as scho will suer and a man in hir hand
and all othir gudis of arschip at pertenis till Johne his brothir in the tyme
of the dissece of hym of his avin propir gudis and gif he may nocht
pref it lat hir quyt hir with ane in hir hande
The fyft dai of october Juljji

The fyft dai of Julij the yer of god et cetera lxxvij yeris Dauid mathousone burges of this
burgh presentit to the Aldirman and bailyeis a lettre of our souerane lordis vndir his priwa
seil belangine Wilyaim mathousone and his gudis chartiris and euidentis sone till vmquhilum
Johne mathousone quhilk lettre chargit aldirman and bailyeis to deliuere to the said Dauj
the forsaid Wilyaim togidir with al gudis pertening till hime haldin hidirtill' be Alexander rede
and be Wil quelp anenttis the wrangws occupacione of the forhous' pertening to the said
Wil mathousone the aldirman in presens of diuerse of the consal and vdiris chargit the bailyes
to fulfill the comande of our' souerane lordis lettrez quhar euir he war lik als
weil as he war present in propir persone in al pontis contenit in the said lettrez as thai wil
ansuer tharfor befor our souerane lord and his consal

The viij dai of Julij yer' et cetera lxxvij before Thomas of chavmer ane of the
ballies of this burgh William lutar / mage branche his spous' and Dauid
howy hir son ar oblist tocontent and pay til Robert blindsel be mydsum
mir next tocum twa barellis of salmond for the payment of fyve merkis
made to the balyeis of aberdene for thare mail acht be thaim the
said William and mage for ane half nettis fisching of the pot wattir
of the termis of martymes and Witsunday and martymes immediate before
the date of this present write And falyeand of the payment of the
saidis twa barellis of salmond at the said terme of mydsummir the saidis
William mage and Dauid has grantit consentit and ordanit that the said Ro
bert his ayris executouris or assignais sal bruke and ioys' the said half
nettis fisching of the pot wattir fra the said feist of mydsummir
ay and continualie vnto the tym that he or thai be fullely content pait
and assithit of the saidis twa barellis of salt salmond before thir
witnez patrik badenagh the fadir philp of Dunbrek and vthiris sindri
Robert blindel grantis him content of the ij barrelis of salmond before writin et cetera
